channel.title: Visualizations on Joel Soroos
channel.description: Recent content in Visualizations on Joel Soroos

item.title: Visualizations
item.description: A collection of data visualizations I have built for fun using the R programming language. All visualizations are produced via code without post-processing. The examples source data from the weekly R4DS #TidyTuesday project, which provides a community for R and tidyverse enthusisasts to practice and share ideas in wrangling, exploring and visualizing data.
